east-asia.name: East Asia
east-asia.description: Diverse diving from subtropical reefs to temperate kelp forests, including Japan, Korea, and Taiwan.

japan.name: Japan
japan.description: Island nation with world-class diving: subtropical Okinawa, temperate Izu, and unique marine life.

okinawa.name: Okinawa
okinawa.description: Subtropical reefs, WWII wrecks, and manta rays in Japan's southern islands.

kerama-islands.name: Kerama Islands
kerama-islands.description: Crystal-clear waters, coral gardens, and humpback whales in winter.

yonaguni.name: Yonaguni
yonaguni.description: Famous for hammerhead sharks and the mysterious underwater ruins.

izu-peninsula.name: Izu Peninsula
izu-peninsula.description: Accessible from Tokyo, with temperate reefs, macro life, and volcanic topography.

ogawawara-islands.name: Ogasawara Islands
ogawawara-islands.description: Remote Pacific islands with dolphins, whales, and endemic species.
